title: URF 2019 (Riot please read)
body:
Basically I was wondering if it was possible to make the urf gamemode or rotating gamemodes in general possible to be played in customs often me and my friends are in a group more than 5 but really want to enjoy the urf experience together instead of having to queue in separate lobbies. I was just wondering if you could make it so we could make urf possible to be played in customs and if not let me know why.
Thank you.

replies.body: u sound like a true epic gamer can u give me ur pp
It breaks and requires maintenance after every patch, which is why the rotating gamemodes stopped - too much work for not enough players.
I am not saying have it permanantly up which would be nice im just saying when the rotating gamemodes are out it would be nice to play it in custom games
They once said something about the updated client not having been coded to allow for customs. They'd still have to work on that, to make them available there like they once were.
No, URF get's boring after a couple of games and as stated by the game developers after game modes like URF the player base significantly drop's this would most likely be even worsened by custom URF.

It significantly drops because we come here for URF and leave again when it's over. Grinding the same shit for a decade to get borders in a giant farm system doesn't appeal to everyone. Like SC2, I'm only here for the stress free fun shit, and not the near meaningless rank that no one over the age of 15 gives a shit about. 

"Unpopular!", "new client!", "fun stuff makes the boring stuff look worse!", and "you say you like it but you really don't!"....man, there are still people who believe these dump ass reasons? Prod the cattle back into ranked SR and LCS VoDs, and feed them some bullshit about why anything fun gets vaulted.
Ahh actually i'm 15 and 1/2 and i care very much about my bronze two LP!!! sugma
I for one think this is a great idea
Well yes i strictly remember this man abusing me in game for no apparent reason. He cant even play the game why should he have a say in development...{{champion:20}}

yes bc i dont like him 
{{summoner:21}}
thats a bit self centred, you dont even know me

URF is a cancer to the game.

Thank god it's only on for 9 more days.

Great idea, at least we could have fun, but it would be better as another mode like ARAM so we could always have people to play against instead of having to track down 9 other people to play in customs.
